column5: Normally I hear sunfish I think bluegill or pumpkinseed but I guess this counts right?  So the limit is what, 50 a day - what do you think?  Now thats a sunfish
Man...that is a huge, UGLY fish....LOL.  Very interesting...thanks for posting!
Gonna need a bigger hook, and some larger Red Wigglers!  dk
And I thought a 8" ice hole was too big for "Pan Fish"
"A 200 kg specimen may have a brain the size of a nut weighing only 4 g"  Sounds like some of these fools we hear about on the news lol...  Funny looking fish though
lol.. i love the part about their body mass in comparision to their brain size. Awsome specie! Thanks for reporting TbayBoy.
